parameters.name: BusinessType
parameters.description:
The log category. Valid values:

*   **dcdn_log_access_l1** (default): access logs.
*   **dcdn_log_er**: Edge Routine logs.
*   **dcdn_log_waf**: firewall logs.
*   **dcdn_log_ipa**: TCP/UDP proxy logs.

parameters.name: DataCenter
parameters.description:
The data center. Valid values:

*   cn: the Chinese mainland.
*   oversea: outside the Chinese mainland.

parameters.name: DeliveryType
parameters.description:
The destination of the delivery. Valid values:

*   sls: Alibaba Cloud Simple Log Service (SLS).
*   http: HTTP server.
*   aws3: Amazon Simple Storage Service (S3).
*   oss: Alibaba Cloud Object Storage Service (OSS).
*   kafka: Kafka.
*   aws3cmpt: S3-compatible storage service.

parameters.name: FieldName
parameters.description: The log fields, which are separated by commas (,).

parameters.name: HttpDelivery
parameters.description: The configurations for delivery to an HTTP server.

parameters.name: KafkaDelivery
parameters.description: The configurations for delivery to Kafka.

parameters.name: OssDelivery
parameters.description: The configurations for delivery to OSS.

parameters.name: S3Delivery
parameters.description: The configurations for delivery to Amazon S3 or an S3-compatible service.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: The website ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~2850189~~) operation.

parameters.name: SlsDelivery
parameters.description: The configurations for delivery to SLS.

parameters.name: TaskName
parameters.description: The name of the delivery task.
